long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a vertical scroll bar to the Hosted RMM solution from ConnectWise. In Chrome there is a problem where once your list of sessions gets taller than the page, it will not scroll. This fixes that!
